website_summaries.verdict: Terrific story and dialogue, gameplay is smooth and intuitive. Makes being Spider-Man a ton of fun.
pros: Tells a compelling story that’s well-written and funny
Variety of skills, suits, and gadgets to unlock
Lots of side quests and tasks
There’s joy in just swinging around

customer_reviews.title: DLC code is region locked
customer_reviews.text: The DLC is not on the disc and comes in a US region locked code. If you don't have a US account you can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Orel Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Was sent the standard edition
customer_reviews.text: Game itself was great, but wasn't what I ordered. I was sent the standard edition when I ordered the game of the year edition.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: A Beaut of a Game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well paced, well written, well made. Only suffered one glitch whilst playing. Had a blast overall, it really brought a nostalgic feeling to the fore of my mind when it came to the swinging mechanics, very similar in essence to “Spider-man 2”, yet at the same time much better!! 10 out of 10, would play again and I damn well recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Samuel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Game of the Year "Edition"?
customer_reviews.text: The game is as expected - EXCEPTIONAL and a great time. One of the best console games I've played in a while. My concern is with this "Game of the Year" nonsense - this is the exact same Spider-Man disc as the standard edition. You receive a code for any add ons that expires in a couple years. Granted, I'm not out here paying extra for it (it was actually cheaper than the standard edition), but the "GOTY Edition" moniker makes owner transfer basically impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Dirty Case, I Hope The Game Works
customer_reviews.text: So as far as I can tell I didnt buy a used copy, so I dont get why it was this damaged. I thought it could have been damaged by the delivery service but the rips on the case would not have come from that, and there was dirt on the case. The warehouse inspected sticker felt like insult to injury. I'm just disappointed because this was going to be part of my valentine's day gift to my boyfriend and it looks like I pulled it out of a bargain bin. I have not tested the disc yet but the condition of the case makes me wary.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago5

customer_reviews.title: Game of the Year
customer_reviews.text: Spider-Man won Game of the Year for a reason. Fantastic game. Lots of side missions that emerge as you make your way through the main campaign, keeps things exciting and allows you to pace your own progress through the game. The scientific puzzles/missions are fun and add value to the game as opposed to existing as solely filler tasks. Great story with some interesting twists on old relationships and new enemies. Suits, skills, gadgets, and suit powers are easy to use and can be upgraded with points earned through normal game play - no hidden 'pay to play' features. Web swinging is pure joy. Looking forward to replaying at higher difficulty!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This game convinced me to buy a PS4
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this game. The character movement and abilities are easy to get the hang of and remain fun throughout the story. The enemies are diverse enough to keep you from getting bored, and the boss battles are actually fun and not just challenging. The story is fantastic and the visuals are amazing. My favorite Spider-man game since Ultimate Spider-man. The collectibles aren't annoying like many other games. Some side quests are frustrating, and the last DLC felt unnecessarily difficult, but overall this is a great game that convinced me, a long-time Xbox player, to get a PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Brook H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME BUT DLC ON VOUCHER TO DOWNLOAD DIGITAL.
customer_reviews.text: I love this spiderman game, the best spiderman game i ever played in long time. Story, gameplay, challenge are awesome. I put 4 stars cause all DLC came on a voucher instead on the same disc to download and I bought this game before in no DLC version so i got the same disc two times. If you are going to buy spiderman first time this is the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Game
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely amazingly fun game. Just as Jake Baldino put it in his “Before You Buy,” the stuff the game introduces isn’t new (like capturing points and stuff of that sort), but this is essentially the Spider-Man game we needed. It’s just so much fun swinging around in New York City and although some of the buildings may look like plastic sometimes, it doesn’t detract too much from the experience. Overall, great game and would definitely recommend. I actually bought a PS4 just for this game.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: You Can Be Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and I find myself playing it. You’re able to be Spider-Man, get a taste of what it’s like to be him and figure out day to day things you don’t always get to see in Spider-Man movies or cartoons. I see why this got “Game of the Year” honors. No regrets or remorse with this game...best way to be Spider-Man without being bitten by a radioactive spider.
customer_reviews.author: Telecom Herk

customer_reviews.title: Best Spider Man game in quite some time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great "open world" Spider Man. Combat is very smooth, graphics are superb and game play is seamless. Easy to pickup, but load times can be rather long at times, which is a annoying. Aside from that, this is a gem of a game. They finally got a lot right with this one that they got wrong with previous iterations. Worth the purchase at its current price.
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Tried to do a Let's play of Marvel's Spider Man but it's too boring
customer_reviews.text: Boring story, boring one dimensional characters, and boring watered down villains. Terrible pacing, little environmental interaction...etc. One of the best looking, but the worst Spider-Man games I've ever played on any system. I have no idea why this game got a 10/10, I would personally rate it 3/10 because for the same price there are many games that are better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer 928621

customer_reviews.title: This game will keep you playing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game, it's an open world game that will keep you coming back. I beat the game fairly quick because I couldn't put down the controler., And I'm a 49 year old male who rarely plays anymore.
customer_reviews.author: James Farrell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Spider man ps4 style
customer_reviews.text: This game is a great benchmark for the ps4 pro. It’s cutscenes and gameplay and even the load screens feel like they are going to pop out of the screen(4k)! Im early in the adventure, but the game really does make you feel like a super hero! I consider this goty a steal at 14.99. It’s some of the best fun I’ve ever had in a video game! Ty Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cidd Schlagg

customer_reviews.title: Wow, definitely the best Spiderman game & one of the best open worlds
customer_reviews.text: Good writing, good acting, and some of the best gameplay since the Arkham series (more refined even I'd say). I played this one through twice with full completion because even the side quests and in game objectives were super fun. Enjoy really feeling like the webhead. DLCs were also all worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely and incredible game!
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is awesome, I haven't felt so excited playing a Spiderman game in years. The GOTY edition is such a great deal since it comes with all the extra missions DLC. Totally worth it, give it a shot 🎮🕷🕸
customer_reviews.author: Jean Franco CZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun game at cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Finally picked this game up after finally picking up a PS4. This was the first game I bought after getting my PS4. I have been dying to play this game. And so far it has been pretty good. Web slinging all around the city is as fun as you expect it to be. And combat feels a bit like the recent Batman games. That's a plus for me as I do like the Batman games. Overall it's a fun beatem up game featuring spiderman.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, but with DLC problem
customer_reviews.text: I like the Game of the Year Edition, but I thought I will have DLC available on the disk. Instead I had to wait for it to be downloaded for several hours. I'm also not sure, if I give a disk to my friend, will he be able to play DLC and reuse the same code? But generally the game is a masterpiece, enjoyed every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzhebayev Maxat

customer_reviews.title: Way fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome. Been playing on and off for 2 weeks, and it's a blast. From the fighting dynamics to building spidey's loadouts, this game is very entertaining. Even just web swinging through the city (which has actual NYC landmarks) is REALLY fun. It does get a bit repetitive, just like gta and rdr2, but every game does. A must play.
customer_reviews.author: jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Action packed, fun game
customer_reviews.text: After Best Buy completely screwed up my black Friday order I ordered this game from here. I got it on time for my son and he loved it. Action packed and a fun game all around. The game itself was in great condition and had no damage and I appreciated how quick it got here after all the other problems I had with the previous store.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Must Play for everybody!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited for so long to buy this game, it caught my attention but got the chance now to buy it and boy was it worth it. Immerse yourself and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: misterjdj

customer_reviews.title: Grand game and is there dust in here?
customer_reviews.text: The web slinging made me feel like I was playing Spider-man 2 for the PS2 all over again with some added improvements. The story is excellent Spider-man style mind set, and definitely caused some tears at the end(from dust). The gadget system though not perfect is a huge plus. The costume system is perfect though I went with classic Spidey for the most part. The side quest where both different and with few exceptions fun and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game and the dlc code works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing game i love it alot i cant wait to see if there will be a sequel cause if they keep this up with the amazing story to amazing gameplay mechanics. This game wont disappoint you if your a spiderman fan cause it does what its supposed to and it does it well.
customer_reviews.author: jeramy johnson

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite game!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I have ever played!!! I am a huge Spider-Man fan, and as soon as I saw this I knew I would have to buy it one day. The gameplay was amazing, the music was fantastic, the storyline was incredible, and the DLCs were just as amazing! I would definitely recommend this game to any Spider-Man fan and any videogame fan! 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: MaggieTheBookNerd

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: The physical product itself came intact and in normal condition. The game? Wow, I loved it! Funny, challenging, and just super entertaining. I really was late to buying and playing it but oh man am I glad I eventually tried it out!
customer_reviews.author: Protector

customer_reviews.title: Love this game. Beautiful graphics
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game!! My daughter loves it and hasn’t stopped playing for almost 24 hours straight. It took a while to get here but it was so worth it. It comes with all the downloadable content for free so that’s a huge plus!!
customer_reviews.author: budderfli1031

customer_reviews.title: Best Spiderman game and overall fun
customer_reviews.text: The Spiderman game was amazing it was best known for its amazing demons and Fisks hideouts. Prison base is coming up and lots of things going on I have to tell you this game is worth it. A lot of cool suits, gadgets, and characters. Spiderman’s greatest enemies come together to add to the immense action, spidey quips included.
customer_reviews.author: Techie2012

customer_reviews.title: Came on time but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand when games come in damaged like seriously... and it's the worst kind of damage where the disc is out of its cradle and just flopping around inside the case for who know how long.... disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Ulisse

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those that are fans of the spider-man series
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely the best spider-man game that has come out in a very long time. You get caught up in your immersion of being spider-man when your out on patrols around Manhattan. The Original story is amazing and can easily compete with the comics. FYI it’s mechanics are a light ripoff of the Batman Arkham series but it’s a good thing, trust me, it’s just as good as the Arkham games.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: BECOME Spiderman.
customer_reviews.text: This game is DOPE. BE Spiderman. Swing through the city, take the subway, surf a bus. Bust criminals, climb to the tob of Avengers tower. It's awesome. There's over a dozen costumes to utilize as you defend your city as the Friendly Neighborhood Spiderman.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for little kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids said it was too hard. Didn’t play 10 minutes of it before we took it to game stop for trade.
customer_reviews.author: Seymour Butz

customer_reviews.title: Best Game I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this game except that it eventually ends. I need more. The graphics were beautiful. The story was fun. I loved every second of this game. I'd love a deadpool or iron man one next please.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Time and Effort
customer_reviews.text: Game is the type of quality you expect from Marvel - good story and development. Mechanics take some getting used to, especially when you haven't played these types of games in a while. Whole family seems to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 30 year old son with hopes that he could play it with a four year old boy. They are having a great time with it. The game works for all ages and all levels of expertise.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Too legit to quit.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a brand new/original Spiderman game. If you love Spiderman this is THE game to buy. So much to do with awesome graphics and a large map. The best Spiderman game in my opinion ever.
customer_reviews.author: J. Park

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Spidey games
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading Spider-Man comics over 20 years now - I love the character and the mythos. It's clear the designers of this game love Spider-Man too. It draws on previous PS4 superhero game Infamous Second Son - amd improves. The stealth missions where you play as MJ and Miles drag but can be beaten quick with patience. It isn't very long but then, I can't justify spending 100+ hours in a playthrough these days. The story was completed well and emotionally.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Compain

customer_reviews.title: Lost my husband to this game
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my husband and he plays at least two hours everyday. He loves this game. It did make him feel a tad seasick after he was swinging around for three hours
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Saindon

customer_reviews.title: Age appropriate
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Although my son (10) beat it in story mode in four days (not including the extras) and he’s only allowed to have game time for 2 hours a day. I thought it was kinda fast. Age appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how awesome this game is. Even the side missions are great! Loving the story line. Have to admit, I thought the web-slinging would get old after a few hours, but NOPE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: My gamer loves this game! He says it is one of the best games he has played in awhile!
customer_reviews.author: firemedic2008

customer_reviews.title: Solid RPG
customer_reviews.text: Nice RPG with a decent amount of stuff to do, one thing to note, not a ton of side missions and the game isn't a long RPG I would say around 30 hrs , but I got it on Sale for around $15 around Black Friday, So my 5 star review is based on price and game play....
customer_reviews.author: Enlighten Mind

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but shipping was slow
customer_reviews.text: Great game, but shipping was delayed 4-5 days. Called amazing and they generously gifted me a gift card. Shipping said Prime so kind of expected in 2-3 days. Ended up taking 7.
customer_reviews.author: TheStickels

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Younger Kids and Fun For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves the game and has no issue playing it. Spiderman is one of his favorites and this game is perfect. It did take more memory then I expected so I had to delete some other games in order to install this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Best comic book game ever made.
customer_reviews.text: It's an epic adventure and includes all the DLC! Picked it up again to play through the DLC and check it out on our new 4K TV and it's easily the best super hero game ever made!
customer_reviews.author: The David

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the hype
customer_reviews.text: Tried to play it but the combat was too button mashy and unskilled. Flying through the cities via web also felt super clunky. Put it down when I realized I wasn't really having any fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Was told that the game would update to give me New Game Plus. It did not. Basically just bought the same Spiderman game again. Was told this was an updated version with the new game plus feature. It is not. It is version 1.00. The new game plus feature is a patch on version 1.07 and 1.08. Your lying ass conned me and I will make sure to warn others before they buy from you.
customer_reviews.author: n.3.x

customer_reviews.title: A must own
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I’ve ever played. Not even a fan or have any clue about Spider-Man (I know I know) but how you transition so seamlessly into action is so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: Might be the best super hero game. Go all around new york city and collect unlockables, new suits. Take part in epic battles against the sinister six. A must own playstation 4 exclusive or wait till the playstation 5 miles morales release.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my son quieter than Spider Man sneaking up on someone
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game and really enjoys exploring the “open world” of it....this game was a BIG hit for Christmas and that’s all you can ask for
customer_reviews.author: Sar

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5 Will enjoy Platnuming this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. I knew this game was good but I didn't know it would be this godlike. Funny enough I can say you don't know how strong Spiderman is until you play thia game, its one thing ro see the movies and see him flip around but its another to first hand see how he can beat up 15 dudes with guns point blank in 15 seconds. Wow just wow
customer_reviews.author: Nate.P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Game
customer_reviews.text: this game is the EXACT way a spider-man game should be, every time I played it there was always something fun to do!
customer_reviews.author: Kenly Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: The Spidey We Deserve
customer_reviews.text: The game is AMAZING. Or even SPECTACULAR. The story is good, characters are true to form, and I could just web swing through the Big Apple for hours. My only complaint with the game is the challenges. They’re required to 100% the game and some of them are HORRIBLY unforgiving. I played on hard and didn’t have a problem with combat at all...the only problem I ran into was the challenges. Other than that, an almost flawless game. 4.5/5
customer_reviews.author: DrunkenSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the game
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what was described and what was delivered to our home. My son loves this game and he was every delighted when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Complicated buttons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for father's day. He says he really enjoys it but it's difficult to remember all the controls. He says there are a lot of button combinations to remember and he has trouble keeping them straight.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It's Spiderman done right.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid Spiderman game. The story is a little flat and needs some work. Also the Ubisoft like design where you climb towers and everything is revealed to you in that section should probably go away. Other than that this game is just about perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Alexander Brizuela

customer_reviews.title: The dlcs are not on the disc and will expire at some point
customer_reviews.text: The game itself deserves 5 stars but this is.no special version. Its literally the orginally disc with a code to get the dlc. I dont mind because I didn't have the dlc so it's cool I got it and all. But I assumed til I actually read the case when i got it that it would all be on the disc itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great game, I really enjoyed the story. The game of the year edition comes with all the DLC that has come out, which adds more content to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: This game is the most fun a spider-fan can have. It’s reminiscent of past games, but very much fun to swing through New York and beat up thugs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Keen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a Xmas gift. This game was my son's favorite among all the games recieved. He stated it was a great game!
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun addicting game
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he loves it. Has had it for a few days and has played it every chance he has since it arrived
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Barber

customer_reviews.title: Best game you’ll ever try in a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best games I had ever played especially for the quality since it was made in 2018. This is basically a video game and a movie together. Although the story might not be long, it was something i enjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Omid

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, great graphics!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew who is 12. He showed me some of the gameplay and it looks very fun with fantastic graphics. It kept him fully entertained for the whole Christmas break.
customer_reviews.author: Marino357

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: Game is excellent; seller is communicative. Really appreciated that. Came wrapped and clearly new, on point.
customer_reviews.author: Paul and Tina Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Great Game.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the most entertaining games I've played in years. If you get tired of the missions, or just need a break, there are hundreds of side missions to do. Very cool fighting system. Just swinging around town is super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian heredia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son absolutely, positively LOVES this game!!! He says once you get the hang of it, it's really awesome! He loves to be challenged and this game did just that. He received it for Christmas and he has already mastered it.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa redding

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Great story line with enough animations that it’s fun to watch as well. Has puzzles, action, hidden secrets and a lot of thought into the graphics throughout the map. Free roaming environment allows for control over game play. I would definitely buy this again. I’ve won the game and may play again.
customer_reviews.author: Professor84

customer_reviews.title: My kids really enjoy this game!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 and 12 year old. I am very particular about what they play. Spider-Man is age appropriate for my kids ages, it is not gory/bloody or use of profanity. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This game is beyond good. Details, mechanics, everything is great about it. Can't believe I waited so long to get it! Bright side is this edition includes all the DLC!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Braun

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Bought it mainly for the add on material which is ok. The standard game is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jiten Patel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: As described highly satisfied for a cheaper price than anyone else can compete with including Walmart
customer_reviews.author: janice lee

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My son loves spiderman so I got him this video game, he says it's so fun and entertaining, he plays it all the time, fun.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It's the best marvel version of Batman game ever
customer_reviews.text: Bezt spiderman so far. Reminds me a lot of the Batman series but this time is spiderman. Na na na na spiderman
customer_reviews.author: C. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this game
customer_reviews.text: My son love this game. I brought it for him for his birthday, he could not stop playing it
customer_reviews.author: Mom in charge

customer_reviews.title: Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas. It wasn't even on his wishlist, but has quickly become his favorite gift. I like the storyline and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! And it includes a code in the case for the DLC season pass! Can't go wrong, especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Mares

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, one of the best games of the generation. Must play for any PS4 owner!
customer_reviews.author: KiryuDojima

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Just as the reviews say, this game is really fun! I have not played video games in a while, but my boyfriend and I have had a lot of fun playing together!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Finley

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The game was excellent and I was able to take advantage of a good end of year sale from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Richard Russell II

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This is my second copy I got 1 when it first come out and was looking into getting the DLC then this copy went on sale so I just got it. Recommend this game
customer_reviews.author: water rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews and buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best Spider-man game to date and a must have for an PS4 library.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Payne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly what I was expecting and it made a great gift for my son's 8th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Best Spider-Man game ever made
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most immersive Spider-Man game, worth it for the fun of web swinging through the city alone
customer_reviews.author: Tahm

customer_reviews.title: A favorite
customer_reviews.text: So far I see it’s one of the favorites... only minus it is a single player game
customer_reviews.author: caribshopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game.
customer_reviews.text: I am not even a super hero fan but this is one of the best games I’ve ever played.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Love the spider
customer_reviews.text: My son love playing the game, it’s full of action packed and super hero stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Zero

customer_reviews.title: PS4 game
customer_reviews.text: Item receives as described. I the long term no problem, desc came in fantastic condition.
customer_reviews.author: Malvin Loaiza

customer_reviews.title: The game don’t work and download content says all ready Ben used
customer_reviews.text: the game don’t work I went to play it ... it keeps saying error and when I looked at the game it. Looks like it’s scratched plus the download content for it ...it says the code has Ben used all ready can I ask if youns can send me a nother game of this Ive Ben waiting to play this game since it came out
customer_reviews.author: Thegrimreaper469

customer_reviews.title: Boring, but okay.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and such were okay. Came as expected not damaged and new of course. The game itself was just kinda boring. But if it doesn’t bored you, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my nephew and he finished it in one week. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Bar Rick

customer_reviews.title: My bfs likes it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend said it's one of the the best games he played. So yeah

customer_reviews.title: Came earlier than schedule to
customer_reviews.text: Spider Man game wasn'tsupposed to come until the 26th and it came early a day before Christmas so I was really grateful for that.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Although I don’t get into games my grandson says this one is fun!!

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved the game alot beat it quickly tho. Great graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Kiri B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and exciting!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just got this game a few weeks ago and has already gotten his way through it! He loved the game and it allowed for free roaming but very specific targets. It is more mission focused but he was free to do side missions or explore the city when he wanted to. Highly recommend for some fun and great storytelling!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Baskaran

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: Came great with no damage to the box. And its an awesome game.
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: BE THE SPIDER-MAN!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the BEST video games I’ve ever played, definitely the best Spider-Man game I’ve ever played. The DLC content is off the chain, the main story is incredible. I have had so much fun with this game I think it’ll be the first video game I get 100% completion on because I literally am having a hard time getting enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! Just learning how to use it. So far going great!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Really a good game. I’ve enjoyed playing it, cool story line.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: The best Spiderman game I never knew I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best games available on the PS4! I love the dlc's that come with it too! Can't wait for the new game to come out, highly recommend for PS4!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Loved this game
customer_reviews.text: Everything you’ve heard is true. The swinging mechanics, the story line. I loved this game and don’t regret the time I spent playing it. I was mildly depressed when I finished.
customer_reviews.author: ez617

product_meta.title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Game of The Year Edition - PlayStation 4
feature_bullets: Marvel's Spider man features the acrobatic abilities, improvisation and Web slinging that the wall crawler is famous for, while also introducing elements never before seen in a Spider man game
The ultimate spider-man game and experience the all-new adventure everyone is talking about
